verses.verse: Now <S%H6583>Pashhur<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, who was <S%H6496>chief<s%> <S%H5057>officer<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H5012>prophesying<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>.

Then <S%H6583>Pashhur<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> him in the <S%H4115>stocks<s%> that were in the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, which was in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And it came to pass on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>, that <S%H6583>Pashhur<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> out of the <S%H4115>stocks<s%>. Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> unto <S%H3068>him<s%>, Jehovah hath not <S%H7121>called<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6583>Pashhur<s%>, but <S%H4036>Magor-missabib<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I will make thee a <S%H4032>terror<s%> to <S%H157>thyself<s%>, and to all thy friends; and they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H5414>it<s%>; and I will give all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and he shall carry them <S%H1540>captive<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and shall <S%H5221>slay<s%> them with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

Moreover I will <S%H5414>give<s%> all the <S%H2633>riches<s%> of this <S%H5892>city<s%>, and all the <S%H3018>gains<s%> <S%H3366>thereof<s%>, and all the precious things <S%H214>thereof<s%>, yea, all the treasures of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>; and they shall make them a <S%H962>prey<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H935>them<s%>, and carry them to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

And <S%H6583>thou<s%>, Pashhur, and all that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in thy <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and there thou shalt <S%H4191>die<s%>, and there shalt thou be <S%H6912>buried<s%>, <S%H157>thou<s%>, and all thy friends, to whom thou hast <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thou hast <S%H6601>persuaded<s%> <S%H6601>me<s%>, and I was persuaded; thou art <S%H2388>stronger<s%> than <S%H3201>I<s%>, and hast prevailed: I am become a <S%H7814>laughing-stock<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>, every one mocketh <S%H3932>me<s%>.

For as <S%H1767>often<s%> as I <S%H1696>speak<s%>, I <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H2199>out<s%>; I <S%H7121>cry<s%>, <S%H2555>Violence<s%> and <S%H1697>destruction<s%>! because the word of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is made a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> unto <S%H7047>me<s%>, and a derision, all the <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And if I <S%H559>say<s%>, I will not make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of <S%H1696>him<s%>, nor speak any more in his <S%H8034>name<s%>, then there is in my <S%H3820>heart<s%> as it were a <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> shut <S%H6113>up<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones<s%>, and I am <S%H3811>weary<s%> with <S%H3557>forbearing<s%>, and I cannot <S%H3201>contain<s%>.

For I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1681>defaming<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%>, <S%H4032>terror<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>. <S%H5046>Denounce<s%>, and we will <S%H5046>denounce<s%> <S%H582>him<s%>, say all my familiar <S%H8104>friends<s%>, they that watch for my <S%H6763>fall<s%>; peradventure he will be <S%H6601>persuaded<s%>, and we shall <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against <S%H3947>him<s%>, and we shall take our revenge on <S%H5360>him<s%>.

But <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is with me as a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H6184>one<s%> and a <S%H7291>terrible<s%>: therefore my persecutors shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%>, and they shall not <S%H3201>prevail<s%>; they shall be <S%H3966>utterly<s%> put to <S%H954>shame<s%>, because they have not dealt <S%H7919>wisely<s%>, even with an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3639>dishonor<s%> which shall never be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%>.

But <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, that <S%H974>triest<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, that <S%H7200>seest<s%> the <S%H3629>heart<s%> and the <S%H3820>mind<s%>, let me <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on <S%H1540>them<s%>; for unto thee have I revealed my <S%H7379>cause<s%>.

Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H1984>praise<s%> ye <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for he hath <S%H5337>delivered<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7489>evil-doers<s%>.
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the <S%H3117>day<s%> wherein I was <S%H3205>born<s%>: let not the <S%H3117>day<s%> wherein my <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> me be <S%H1288>blessed<s%>.

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> who brought <S%H1319>tidings<s%> to my <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H2145>A<s%> <S%H1121>man-child<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> unto <S%H8055>thee<s%>; making him very <S%H8055>glad<s%>.

And let that <S%H376>man<s%> be as the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2015>overthrew<s%>, and <S%H5162>repented<s%> <S%H8085>not<s%>: and let him hear a <S%H2201>cry<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H8643>shouting<s%> at <S%H6256>noontime<s%>;
because he <S%H4191>slew<s%> me not from the <S%H7358>womb<s%>; and so my <S%H517>mother<s%> would have been my <S%H6913>grave<s%>, and her <S%H7358>womb<s%> <S%H5769>always<s%> <S%H2030>great<s%>.

Wherefore came I <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H7358>womb<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5999>labor<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow<s%>, that my <S%H3117>days<s%> should be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> with <S%H1322>shame<s%>?
